item.description: Table of Contents SharpestThought Blog Temporary and Universal Challenges Of ancient wars and modern troubles Universal problems Render unto Caesar The Mirror SharpestThought Blog The sharpest thought cuts closest to the truth Temporary and Universal Challenges Of ancient wars and modern troubles The Romans and the Cartaginians were quite unhappy with one another for a long time. Cato the Censor certainly seemed to think so. Yet Carthage was a temporary problem.
